body_html:
Dear all,
I am new with torch.

I also face the error: “RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (35) : CUDA driver version is insufficient for CUDA runtime version at torch/csrc/cuda/Module.cpp:107”

I am running a code which needs torch version 0.3.x instead of the newest one.
I am using CPU, even though the code was written with CUDA.
I installed via conda install pytorch=0.3.1 -c pytorch and then I used pip to install torchvision.

If it is any help, the problem is at line:
netG.load_state_dict(torch.load(opt.netG))

I would really appreciate it if you could help me.

Thanks in advance!

If it is any help, the problem is at line:

Thanks in advance!
body:
Dear all, 
I am new with torch.

I also face the error: “RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (35) : CUDA driver version is insufficient for CUDA runtime version at torch/csrc/cuda/Module.cpp:107”

I am running a code which needs torch version 0.3.x instead of the newest one.
I am using CPU, even though the code was written with CUDA. 
I installed via conda install pytorch=0.3.1 -c pytorch and then I used  pip to install torchvision.

If it is any help, the problem is at line:  
netG.load_state_dict(torch.load(opt.netG))

I would really appreciate it if you could help me.

Thanks in advance!
